definition: the trait of exhibiting no personal embarrassment or concern
details:
noun
- the trait of exhibiting no personal embarrassment or concern
= example: the trait of exhibiting no personal embarrassment or concern
- the quality of being bland and gracious or ingratiating in manner
= synonyms: smoothness, suavity, suaveness
- lacking any distinctive or interesting taste property
= synonyms: insipidity, insipidness
